name: Bandit Hideout
description: A secret base serves as headquarters for a bandit gang, with living quarters, storage for stolen goods, and defensive positions. The stolen wealth and contraband attract other criminals and law enforcement, while the numerous bandits and their traps create constant danger.
atmosphere: Hidden chambers connected by secret passages contain piles of stolen goods and ill-gotten treasure. The air carries sweat, leather, and contraband. Concealed traps protect valuable caches while wanted posters and coded messages cover rough wooden tables. Multiple escape routes tunnel into darkness.
